Class HighScoreService

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.game.stats.HighScoreService
public final class HighScoreService extends Object
Persists leaderboard records on the user's machine to survive new sessions.

The backing file defaults to ~/.comp2042/highscores.dat and can be overridden via:

  1. HIGHSCORES_FILE_PROPERTY — explicit file path
  2. HIGHSCORES_DIR_PROPERTY — directory that contains "highscores.dat"
  3. DATA_DIR_PROPERTY — shared data directory also leveraged by GameSettingsStore
Writes are flushed to a temporary file and renamed atomically to avoid corruption if the JVM exits mid-write.
